text: Myra Ndjoku Manianga is the Minister of the Interior of the Democratic Republic of the Congo. He studied at the university of Nanterre in France. He was Secretary General of the State Security Committee. He is from Kasai- Occidental. He became minister in 2001. == Sources == Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:Government ministers of the Democratic Republic of the Congo
title: Myra Ndjoku Manianga
